job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: The team works on multiple dimensions<br><br>Unique opportunity to work with open source.<br>Work on Security, Onboarding and platform integrations with cutting edge Cloud security features<br>Key responsibilities include<br><br>Work on developing code samples in the areas of mTLS and authentication<br>Work on onboarding security features <br><br>Mandatory<br>Experienced with an open-source software development environment. - Familiar with Golang - Bachelors in Engineering, Computer Science is preferred, or equivalence of industry experience<br>Desired<br>Experience in the following domain areas is a plus: - Networking - Authentication/Identity - API Client development
